Noushost offers a variety of Expert Shared Hosting Plans to fit any need. No matter whether you’re starting a blog with WordPress, installing a CMS solution with Drupal, opening a forum with PHPBB, starting an online store with osCommerce, or any number of ventures beyond those mentioned above, our Expert Web Hosting plans are exactly what you’ve been looking for.

NousHost provides an offshore shared web hosting services at affordable rates with best in features located in Netherlands. Delivering high value,small budget and complete shared hosting solutions. NousHosts shared hosting package comes with cPanel, which you can control and manage your website such as email accounts, FTP accounts, addon domains, subdomains, webstats, MySQL databases, Softaculousand many more features.

Maximize speed through rapid queries and less latency with SSD Storage, a standard feature on all web hosting plans.
